description: Lower wages and border controls are making the Isle of Man less attractive to new staff, says ex-head.
title: Teachers' pay erosion 'limiting recruitment' on Isle of Man
title_page: Teachers' pay erosion 'limiting recruitment' on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: Annette Baker, who officially left her post at Ramsey Grammar School on Thursday, said teaching was "arguably one of the most important jobs to do".
